bike.description: Specialized E5 aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld, semi-compact race design, shaped TT, 1-1/2" lower bearing, internal cable routing, integrated headset, threaded BB

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon legs, alloy crown and steerer, 1-1/2" lower bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-1/5" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 8mm cone spacer with 20mm of spacers
Specialized Comp-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Specialized CX Comp 6061 alloy, short drop
Black cage, body & toe clips w/ strap
Forged alloy Hub, sealed bearings, 32 hole, for J bend round spokes
Forged Alloy Hub, Sealed, 32 hole, for J Bend Round spokes, GCC
Specialized Houffalize CX Sport, 700x32c, aramid bead, 60TPI, Dual Compound
Specialized Houffalize CX Sport, 700x32c, aramid bead, 60TPI, Dual Compound
Body Geometry Riva Road, w/ steel rails
Specialized Comp, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, aluminum head, two-bolt clamp, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
